entry.title: Container Overview
entry.summary:
Container is a righ way to run application in a sandbox and this technology becomes an alternative to virtualization. Container is already used by many companies such as Google, Netflix, Amazon, ... This talk is a short overview (10mn) to present the base of this technology.

View online on GitHub
entry.content:
Container is a righ way to run application in a sandbox and this technology becomes an alternative to virtualization. Container is already used by many companies such as Google, Netflix, Amazon, ... This talk is a short overview (10mn) to present the base of this technology.

View online on GitHub

entry.title: Bitcoin
entry.summary:
Bitcoin is the main blockchain for crypto-currency. This long talk (2h) is a presentation for newbie to understand this technology with Bitcoin.

Download slides : 2017-01-04, 2015-12-19.
entry.content:
Bitcoin is the main blockchain for crypto-currency. This long talk (2h) is a presentation for newbie to understand this technology with Bitcoin.

Download slides : 2017-01-04, 2015-12-19.

entry.title: Keytool
entry.summary:
Keytool is a command line tool provided by Oracle to create and manage Java keystore. This long talk (45min) presents the best practices to create a private and public key, create a Certificate Signing Request, ...

Download slides here.
entry.content:
Keytool is a command line tool provided by Oracle to create and manage Java keystore. This long talk (45min) presents the best practices to create a private and public key, create a Certificate Signing Request, ...

Download slides here.

entry.title: OpenSSL
entry.summary:
OpenSSL is a command line tool to create and manage certificate. This long talk (45min) presents the best practices to create a certificate authority, a private and public key, a Certificate Signing Request, ... with OpenSSL.

Download slides here.
entry.content:
OpenSSL is a command line tool to create and manage certificate. This long talk (45min) presents the best practices to create a certificate authority, a private and public key, a Certificate Signing Request, ... with OpenSSL.

Download slides here.
